ai.description: Choose from GPT-4, Claude and other AI models. Create custom agents tailored to your projects.

collaboration.description: Chat with AI in real-time. See responses as they're generated. Your conversation history is always saved.

management.description: Organize work in projects. Upload documents, images, and code. Your AI remembers the context.
management.title: Project Organization

mobile.description: Install as an app on any device. Work on your phone, tablet, or desktop with the same great experience.
mobile.title: Works Everywhere

performance.description: Install on any device, work offline, sync automatically. Fast and reliable wherever you are.
performance.title: Work Anywhere

pwa.description: Keep working without internet. Your changes sync automatically when you're back online.
pwa.title: Offline Mode

security.description: Enterprise-grade security with team permissions, usage limits, and complete audit trails.
security.title: Team Security

ux.description: Personalize your workspace with dark/light mode, notification preferences, and custom settings.
ux.title: Your Workspace, Your Way

features.subtitle: Everything you need to build with AI. Simple to start, powerful enough for teams.

techStack.title: Built with Modern Technologies

footer.tagline: The future of development is here. Build amazing projects with AI assistance.

hero.subtitle: Create projects with AI assistants that understand your context. Collaborate in real-time, work offline, and manage everything from your phone or desktop.

pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more. No surprises, cancel anytime.
pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing

elena.content: The real-time chat with AI is incredibly responsive. I get instant answers while my code is still fresh in my mind.
elena.name: Elena Rodriguez

marcus.content: We cut our AI costs by 40% thanks to the usage tracking. Now I know exactly which projects use what, and can set limits for the team.
marcus.name: Marcus Johnson

sarah.content: I love that I can start a conversation with AI on my phone during lunch and pick it up on my laptop at the office. Everything just syncs.
sarah.name: Sarah Chen

testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of teams already building with AI Projects.
